title: Teddy Floppy Ear: Mt Adventure v1.2
description:
Now you can enjoy Teddy Floppy Ear speaking native Polish language!!
Choose between Polish and English lectors (in main menu) or subtitles (options menu).
In main menu we also added a link to walkthrough that will help you anytime you get stuck. 

Teddy Floppy Ear is a main character of series of adventure games for the children based on the famous polish cartoon. Each game mixes entertaining adventure with a healthy dose of learning.

In "Mountain adventure" episode Teddy visits his uncle, who is a painter living in the mountains.

During mountain travels Teddy solves numerous minigames and learns basics of art, color mixing and grading, shape recognition and many more.
Beautiful hand-painted graphics, soothing music, entertaining and violence free story keep your child occupied for hours.

- Great for even the youngest kids
- Educational value
- Absolutely no violence
- Numerous mini-games for variety
- Polish or English speaking lector
- Polish or English subtitles as an option

What's New:

Added polish language lectors.
Added polish subtitles.
Added a link to walkthrought to help if player got stuck.

More info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Forever.Uszatek3" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Forever.Uszatek3</a>


Instructions:

1.Install APK
2.Copy 'com.Forever.Uszatek3' folder to 'sdcard/Android/Obb'
3.Launch the game
